amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Proceedings, taxes or assessments levied, bonds issued; validity.
amendatorysection.para: Any proceedings taken, taxes or assessments levied or bonds issued pursuant to sections 19-3301 to 19-3326 shall not be held invalid for failure to comply with the provisions of sections 19-3301 to 19-3326.
